main event: A resident discovered an unidentified flying object on private property and reported it to the sheriff's office in Jackson, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was turned over to the sheriff's office on 21 July 1947., The object was described as an instrument weighing four or five pounds with specific measurements., Witnesses include a resident who found the object in a tree and a sheriff who verified its arrival., A portion of the object suggests military origin with markings indicating it is associated with the U.S. Army Signal Corps., No photographs of the object are included in the documentation.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object described as an instrument
witness description: a resident who found the object, the sheriff who received it, and another individual who has indirect knowledge of the discovery
